scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:UserLinks_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($links = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('links','Link=editProfile&Link=cancelEditProfile&Link=administer&Link=moderate'))) #set($hasLinks = false) #set($user = $core_v2_user.Current) #set ($collapse = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('collapsed', false)) #set ($userLinks = $links.Values('Link')) #set ($linksToShow = $userLinks.Count) #if ($collapse) #set ($linksToShow = 0) #end #foreach($link in $userLinks) #beforeall
    #each #set($url = false) #if ($link == 'editProfile') #set($isEditable = true) #if (!$user || $user.Id != $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id || !$core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set($isEditable = false) #end #set ($isInEditMode = true) #if (!$isEditable || !$core_v2_editableGroup.IsEditable('User')) #set ($isInEditMode = false) #end #if ($isEditable) #if ($isInEditMode)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('saveprofile')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #else
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('editprofile')
    • #end #end #set($hasLinks = true) #elseif ($link == 'cancelEditProfile') #set($isEditable = true) #if (!$user || $user.Id != $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id || !$core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set($isEditable = false) #end #set ($isInEditMode = true) #if (!$isEditable || !$core_v2_editableGroup.IsEditable('User')) #set ($isInEditMode = false) #end #if ($isEditable && $isInEditMode)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end #set($hasLinks = true) #elseif ($link == 'administer') #set($administerUrl = false) #set($administerUrl = $core_v2_urls.EditUser($user.Id)) #if ($administerUrl)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('link_administer')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #elseif($link == 'moderate' && $user.Id != $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
  • $core_v2_ui.Moderate($user.ContentId, $core_v2_user.ContentTypeId, "%{ }")
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #afterall
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
#end #if($hasLinks == false) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:UserLinks_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="collapsed" labelResourceName="collapsed" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="links" labelResourceName="Links" defaultValue="Link=editProfile&Link=cancelEditProfile&Link=administer" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_sortableList" height="275" key="Link"> <propertyValue value="editProfile" labelResourceName="link_editprofile" orderNumber="1000000" /> <propertyValue value="cancelEditProfile" labelResourceName="link_canceleditprofile" orderNumber="1000001" /> <propertyValue value="administer" labelResourceName="link_administer" orderNumber="1000002" /> <propertyValue value="moderate" labelResourceName="link_moderate" orderNumber="1000003" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

Click this button and you can share information about yourself with the community and update your photo.</resource> <resource name="UserLinks_Description">Displays links related to a user.</resource> <resource name="UserLinks_Name">User - Links</resource> </language>
